alert.note: Alert for Carter; Love (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 8:19PM CDT until May 15 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Love County in southern Oklahoma... Southwestern Carter County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 818 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Milo, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lone Grove, Healdton, Wilson and Graham. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
